projects.name: Chessy
projects.description: A chess-club management system with the possibility to organise tournaments.

projects.name: Estimator App
projects.description: A cloud native mobile App helping users find the best deal on any item across all online retailers. For now only the API for the app is deployed. The application will be uploaded on Appetize.io shortly

projects.name: Slurp
projects.description:
A digital coffee shop platform that stands to disrupt the coffee shop business in London and beyond.
The system consists of 2 applications. The first one is a cross-platform mobile app aimed at coffee enthusiasts which, by the means of a map, allows users to easily browse through nearby coffee shops as well as quickly and seamlessly make an order. The second one is a Tablet app designed for coffee shops. Firstly, it comprises an order management interface which enables coffee shops to easily manage, track and prioritise orders. Secondly, it integrates a stock management system for monitoring stocks resulting in reduced waste and improvement of both staff and customer experience by avoiding cancelled orders.

Work Experience.description:
- Design, develop and unit test applications in accordance with established standards
- Package and support the deployment of releases
- Analyze and resolve technical and application problems
- Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on-budget

- In charge of the successful launch of a Pilot Program in September in London.
- Oversee the infrastructure of the product and manage the company's technological roadmap. 
- Analyze target markets to create a viable business model/strategy.
- Act as a liaison between the customers and the business.
Building Opus, a cross-platform (web and mobile) AI driven talent-matching application.

Conducted bi-weekly 2-hour tutorials with 20 students per session in the "Software Engineering" module; covering the main components of the Software Development Process and techniques to enhance its quality.

about.description:
I am a multi-lingual Full-Stack Software Engineer whose mission is to empower small businesses by offering bespoke technical solutions that leverage the power of modern cloud computing and AI, enabling them to thrive in the digital world.
 I aim to deliver financial prosperity through competitive solutions that respect and highlight their unique identity while multiplying their visibility and promoting their expertise. 
It also means providing equitable access to high quality fairtrade products at affordable prices.
 In that vision, I Co-founded Slurp, a tech start up that stands to disrupt the coffee shop business in London and beyond.
